org.jmesa.worksheet
Class WorksheetUpdater

java.lang.Object
  org.jmesa.worksheet.WorksheetUpdater

public class WorksheetUpdater
extends Object

Will store the Worksheet object in the users session by the table id. However, once the servlet is set up the developer will not ever have to deal with the fact that the Worksheet object is in session. The ajax calls will abstract that out from the html table side. Then the TableFacade will abstract out the retrieve of the Worksheet in the controller.

Since:
2.3
Author:
Jeff Johnston

validateWorksheet

protected String validateWorksheet(Worksheet worksheet,
                                   WorksheetRow row,
                                   WorksheetColumn column,
                                   String errorMessage)
Validate that the columns original value is not the same as the changed value. If it is then remove the column from the row.
